span.p: Maine's Commissioner of Education and Governor have recommended that districts plan for remote learning the remainder of the school year. In light of this, HCA will not be returning to our buildings this school year and will continue our remote learning and online classes through the end of the school year -- Thursday, June 18th. Please see the full announcement from Scott Barksdale, Head of School HERE. Community members looking for resources will find a compiled guide HERE.
